card_text: 2+ Effect Monsters$NGains 200 ATK for each Link Monster in the GYs. You can only use each of the following effects of "Amphibious Swarmship Amblowhale" once per turn.$N●If this card is destroyed: You can target 1 Link-3 or lower monster in either GY; Special Summon it.$N●If a Link-3 or lower monster(s) on the field is destroyed by battle or card effect while this card is in your GY: You can banish this card from your GY; destroy 1 card on the field.
